name: .SRS File Extension
summary: Learn about .SRS files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Stores send and receive e-mail settings for Microsoft Outlook; can store group settings for users with multiple e-mail accounts; may be modified within Outlook by selecting Options→Mail Setup→Send/Receive Settings.

content: The Outlook Send and Receive settings file is typically named "OUTLOOK.SRS."

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
